desc:
**Mural Goal:**

Asana Ticket [https://app.asana.com/0/1201321795867183/1205711999727896/f](https://app.asana.com/0/1201321795867183/1205711999727896/f "smartCard-inline")

Records are being synced to Salesforce from Marketo, and RingLead picks up the records for processing before Marketo is done stamping information. The changes Marketo makes after the initial sync (even within the first minute) trigger the same lead to be processed again by RingLead, which is changing assignments and consuming/skipping the rep's spot in the round-robin.

Wanted to call out that these are MQLs so it has more urgency than "other" leads.

Here are some examples:

[martin.greene@fishawack.com](mailto:martin.greene@fishawack.com "")
[jgant@fetzer.org](mailto:jgant@fetzer.org "")
[gilberto.jimenez@biplanning.com.co](mailto:gilberto.jimenez@biplanning.com.co "")
[a.ouden@restauratiefonds.nl](mailto:a.ouden@restauratiefonds.nl "")

**Mural Card Scope:**

1. Review use case above and in Asana
2. Create new section for an evaluation in the WIP document
3. Evaluate options to:
   1. Leverage a sync delay (I dont like this idea)
      1. Document pros and cons of a sync delay
   2. Think through a better recommendation, like record mastering before the sync from Marketo to Salesforce

_**Mural Card Outcome:**_

1. Documented Assessment
name: (4) Delay in Marketo before MQLs sync to SFDC [4.19]
